View All Seasons Social Reviews  2 Discussions  0 A review by Baz  6.0 Written by  Baz  on May  9, 2018 Killing Eve is mediocre at best. Some very far-fetched plot holes.
The acting is very weak and hammy at times . After watching 4 episodes I started asking myself ‘Why am I watching this? And couldn’t answer it!’ There’s better ways to waste time!
